name: 'Company', href: '#' }, { name: 'Stores', href: '#' }, ], } function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Navigation() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [openAuthModal, setOpenAuthModal] = useState(false); const [anchorEl, setAnchorEl] = useState(false); const openUserMenu = Boolean(anchorEl); const jwt = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); const handleUserClick = (event) => { setAnchorEl(event.currentTarget); } const handleCloseUserMenu = (event) => { setAnchorEl(null); } const handleOpen = () => { setOpenAuthModal(true); } const handleClose = () => { setOpenAuthModal(false); } const handleCategoryClick = (category, section, item, close) => { close(); } return (
